\section*{\begin{picture}(20,0) \put(-5,-10){\includegraphics*[width=1cm]{/www/erowid.org/experiences/images/erologo_1cm_600dpi_greyscale}} \end{picture} Erowid Experience Vaults Report Id: 54060}

\subsection*{Shake Shake Shake}
\vspace{-0.2cm}
by \emph{Mr. P}
\vspace{0.5cm}
\thispagestyle{plain}

\setlength{\parskip}{1ex}
\begin{tabular}[h]{|c|c|c|c|c|}
\hline
Dose:  T+ 0:00 &   & oral & Lotus/Lily - Nymphaea nouchali var caerulea & extract\\
\hline
\end{tabular}

\vspace{1mm}

\begin{tabular}[h]{|c|c|}
\hline
Body weight: & 180.00 lbs\\
\hline
\end{tabular}

\vspace{2mm}
Procedure:



Step 1: I add 20 grams (or more!) of plant matter (or extract) into a blender until powdered.



Step 2: I Pour it into a bottle (preferably glass) with a secure cap.



Step 3: I add half a cup of Everclear (151 proof grain alcohol), and shake vigorously for about 5 minutes.



The most desirable psychological effects from the lotus are empathogenic and stimulating (barring sleepiness). Unlike the effect of an opiod, which is an overt secure affection to varying intensities and layers, Blue Lotus can inspire a gemlike happy, joyful, very alive quality of unattached affectivity - but oddly this only seems to occur when I engage these emotions fully, they are suddenly then intensified.

\end{document}
